items.name: kunenaCategories
items.title: Accessible Categories (Active Subscription)
items.tooltip: Select categories that can be accessed by the user when they have an active subscription

items.name: blockaccess
items.title: Visibility Access to Guest or Non-subscribers
items.tooltip: If, set to None, user will be able to view only category list. If, set to overview, user will be able to view the thread list within this category. If, set to readonly, user will be able to access thread(can't edit or post). If set to ReplyOnly, user can reply on thread but can't create new thread even without having subscription
